        public static int createU(Mcs mcs1,

        createU: It asks the user how many user does he want to create and creates them
        pre
        pos
        Parameters:
        mcs1 - Is the Mcs from the package model that controls everything
        control - Is the integer number that counts how many users were created
        noMoreU - Is a boolean that controls the while loop
        valid - Is a boolean that validates if the username is already taken
        Returns:
        control Is the integer number that counts how many users were created
